title: Can we really choose our destiny in life? - Quora

response.answer_text: yes and no, as individuals we all have strengths and weaknesses, for instance actor verne troyer was never ever going to be a heavyweight boxing champion. or a kardashian will never make it as a brain surgeon, ambition is encouraged and often it is said if you want it then go get it, and thats great for instance anybody has the ability to learn how to act but its still very hard to be successful but why not try it if that is your dream, im just saying as individuals we cant all be all things know your limitations, but if you know you can then go do it, be your own success story.

Of course we can. We have freedom of choice, and within what we are given in this life, we can make active choices to pursue our personal goals. Sometimes other people interfere with our personal plans or goals. But if we are determined, then we will be able to find a way to achieve our goals. There are also good goals and there are unrealistic goals. Sometimes the goal does not really match the person.

life is matter of choice, but for becoming into existence through birth, embracing challenges, and facing death are one’s destiny. can one choose how he.she is going to look like during birth? no. this is destiny - the beginning of your chapter. can one choose to face or avoid challenges in life? yes. this is made through one’s choice - your next chapter. can one escape his.her death? no. this is destiny - your Final Chapter. End.

Intermediate destiny yes,via pathway choices that we see are available,relating to a hosting situation….We all have the end point date with the Grim Reaper ,we can it seems delay this end point action ,BUT we can also SPEED IT UP ,by accident ,(is an accident really a chance happening),OR bad acting! However that is ,it seems, cardinal and therefore immutable ,….for we humans

Only prior to birth at the stage where your contract for this earthly sojourn is being agreed upon. Once you have incarnated you cannot alter destiny but you still have individual choice which plays out in parallel lives.
